Text: These cracks are only for those who want to play the game on "any CPU" and include a "no dvd" crack.

Hello

Could someone kindly tell me how to install this crack ?

Thanks

1. Open the main Tiger disk image
2. Drag and drop "Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2005" onto your hard disk to copy it (wherever you like)
3. Open up the crack of your choice.
4. Drag and drop the Tiger Woods icon into the file that you just copied onto your drive. When it asks if you want to replace it, say "Yes, please, i'd love to play some golf"
5. Double-click and Play!
